text:
Hey all!

I'm trying to add a "total" to display a price, based on HS form fields getting selected. Is there any way to do this with or without JS?

Heres my HubSpot forum post for more detail:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Form-Add-quot-Total-quot-which-changes-based-on-selected-form/td-p/1071936>
